title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 384: Featuring Jon Hamm
description:
On episode 384 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jon Hamm. Jon joined (46:00) to talk about the Blues winning the Cup a few years back, the upcoming playoffs NHL playoffs, his new movie and tons more. The guys first open the show with their 6 playoff previews and some recent NHL news. The fellas also recap the first night of playoff games (02:49:21), including the Leafs monster win and the Bruins tough loss.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
